channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: The bins are full, barely any space to walk past on the pavement, smells!, 1st September
item.description:
The bins are overloaded with recycling and rubbish. There's so much rubbish soon there be no pavement to walk by. Please can it be collected more often

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Berkshire Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian (Zebra) crossing subsidence, 1st September
item.description:
I drove across the crossing and it felt as if I had driven into a pothole. I stopped to check, as it was quite a bump into the hole, however, on closer look, it is sinking, not a pothole. There has been some recent roadworks that included the crossing and I think it's this that is sinking. I crossed over on foot and stepped into the dip, which unsteadied me, and I think it's sufficient for someone to trip, which could be dangerous on the road. Please could someone check this as soon as possible? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Avenue Road, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trip Hazard on Love Walk, 1st September
item.description:
Please replace the pavement on the Love Walk near SE5 8SS with paving stones. The pavement is a trip hazard that contains numerous uneven sections. The pavements throughout SE5 was replaced a few years ago with paving stones but the section of Love Walk near SE5 8SS was overlooked. I have attached pictures of the damaged pavement. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Love Walk, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The orange light on the van has been left on since last thrusday, 1st September
item.description:
Hackney council repair van is been parked outside people houses since last thrusday with its bright orange left constantly on. Flashing! It's a massive disturbance when it's flashing constantly orange light, into your home and bedrooms during whole day

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of rubbish outside library behind the bus stop, 1st September
item.description:
